categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order
Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kral was a  Human male Jedi Master of the Jedi Order who at some point during the Cold War fell to the Dark Side and planned to defect to the Sith Empire. When Operative Kodarn of the SIS became aware of Kral's defection he dispatched a Republic spacer to confront Kral at a meeting with his Imperial contacts.

Kral appears in the appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic under the mission Renegade Conspirator. The mission and all characters involved were cut before the games release. Kral and and the mission he was set to appear in can be found on Jedipedia.
